import React, { Component } from 'react' import {Form, FormGroup, Input, Label, Button} from 'reactstrap'  import { Container, Col, Row } from 'reactstrap'   import { Redirect } from 'react-router-dom'  class AddPet extends Component{ constructor(props){ super(props) this.state = { form: { name: "", dob: "", breed: "", sex: "", medical: "", digestion: "", appointment: "", diary: "", misc: "", user_id: this.props.current_user.id }, success: false } } handleChange = (e) => { let newValues = this.state.form newValues[e.target.name] = e.target.value this.setState({ form: newValues}) } handleSubmit = () => { this.props.createNewPet(this.state.form) this.setState({ success: true }) } render(){ return(

Add A New Pet

 { this.state.success && } ) } } export default AddPet
